TaskDescription: Participants viewed 4 short, age-appropriate video clips taken from television and movies. (Prior to this task, parents were given the opportunity to review the full list of clips and exclude any video clips they deemed unsuitable for their children; no parents had any objections to the clips.). VideoDescription: Rating: Rated PG for some rude humor and language, Description: This comedic movie trailer is a hyperbolic depiction of a child's experience of middle school. It contains several character vignettes., Rationale: This clip is included to probe for socially related anxiety., Link: https://youtu.be/7ZVEIgPeDCE, Length: 1:57
Instructions: Just maintain fixation on the central spot at all times. Press to begin. First, we have to measure the position of your eyes. Just follow the circle with your eyes.
